title: Add ingestion pipeline instrumentation to identify scaling bottlenecks and cost drivers

sections.text: Implement end-to-end metrics and tracing for the ingestion pipeline (fetch → parse → dedupe/cluster → persist → downstream sync) including latency, throughput, queue depth, error rates, and per-stage compute/DB cost estimates. Add structured logs with correlation IDs per source conversation/ticket to trace slow or expensive paths. Create a basic dashboard and alert thresholds to surface regressions as backlog and work-item volume grows.
